I am also an expert Ruby on Rails developer. In my time as an engineer, I have worked with tools such as Elasticsearch, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Nightwatch, mocha, RSpec, Redis, AWS S3, Jenkins and many other web and internetworking technologies

    Rails & Mongo API without generators

    less than 1 minute read

    1. gem install rails
    2. rails new journey-app --api --skip-active-record if you’re going to use another test suite such as RSpec add --skip-test --skip-system-test
    3. add gem 'mongoid' to your gem file
    4. run bundle install in your terminal
    5. create a file called config/mongoid.yml:

    1. you can now run your application server using bin/rails s

    2. create a controller file at app/controllers/projects_controller.rb

    1. in config/routes.rb put Rails.application.routes.draw do namespace :api do namespace :v1 do resources :projects, only: [:index, :show, :create] end end end

    Categories: development, software

    Updated: December 4, 2023
